text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ABC$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the triangle $ABC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AH$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $HC$ is equal to the length of the line $BH$.
The point $H$ lies on the line $CB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AH$, $BC$, $BH$, and $CH$ in the diagram.
